ooC: Heh, an overwhelming amount of people are talking to Megs. lol 
this calls for a general post.

Robo: since the scanners are damaged, they should only be able to 
read about say 4 kilometers in radius around the base. The same goes 
for the Maximal base. You should mention this to Megatron, after 
this post. =)

All: I wish everyone had told me what characters they were going to 
be bringing in on each side so I would know exactly who to order 
around without looking through the posts. =\ After reading through 
150 posts to find out, i'm bombed...


|---Megatron---|

Megatron frowns, he notes that in the futur he might have to make an 
example of Rage. "Alright." His eyes slowly slide over the gathered 
Predacon forces. The right corner of his mouth rises slightly, 
forming a predatory grin on the commander's face. "Drillbit, how 
effective are our scanners at the moment?" Not waiting for an 
answer, "Predacons, we do not know the location of the Maximal base 
at the moment." he shifts his gaze to Warhead and 
UltraByte, "Warhead, you and UltraByte will both lead scouting teams 
and begin range patrols. You will likely be out of comm range, so 
don't bother using them, and don't engage the enemy when you find 
them."

"UltraByte, your team will head west, zig zagging your way until you 
either hit an impass, or you are unable to go any further west. At 
that time, cirle north. Make sure to record the distance travelled, 
and to note any areas that may contain energon deposites. You team 
will consist of the following bots: Apocalypse, Coldfire, 
Quickstrike, and Snowblazer. Arm yourselves, and depart 
immediately." Megatron's head focuses on Warhead.

"Warhead, your team will head east, following the same pattern as 
UltraByte's group. You will head North if you reach an impass, and 
follow the impass until. make sure to record the distance travelled, 
and to note any areas that may contain energon deposites. You team 
will consist of the following bots: Inferno, Rage, Drillbit, and 
Nightshade. You will also depart immediately, so arm yourselves."

"Those who are left will defend the base." He stands, and looks at 
the remaing bots. "Perceptor, take over on the console, start trying 
to make repairs. Waspinator, you're on scout duty. Triptych, get to 
the engine room, and see if anything is salvageable." He glances 
around, "Is Nemesis Enforcer back yet?"
